Message: Hey babe, have you taken any special pics just for me yet? I really want to see what you look like under your clothes ;)
No I've just got in from school. I'm not sure I'm ready for that.

Ok, well when you get changed you can take some then. I want to see what you look like under your clothes ;) Send them to me via quicksnap as then they will be totally private. The message only lasts 10 seconds then gets deleted, so it will be for my eyes only. You are beautiful and I'm really missing you.
I'm not sure. I'll think about it.
Ok babe. Just don't think too long. I don't think I can wait I really want to see you.

Hey gorgeous, are you going to send me those pics? I'll send you one of me if that would help make you feel more comfortable? You know you can trust me right? I really care about you. And remember its just between us.
Did you get my pic? Did you like it? I really want to see you now. Please send me those pictures, it will make me so happy.
Yes I got it. And yes, wow, I liked it. I'm just worried as I've never done this before.
Don't worry about a thing. I think you are amazing and I just really want to see some pics of you, that no one else has seen, as I'm really missing you xxxx
Of course baby. I love you. I wish I could see all of you today. Maybe you could send me a pic of you wearing the necklace I gave you....and nothing else xxxx
I love you too. Maybe when I am alone I'll take some pics Xxx
That would be amazing :) xxx
I'm a bit nervous, but I'll try to take some pics later. Promise you won't show anyone?
Of course, babe. I promise it's just between us. I can't wait to see them. You're so special to me.
Okay, I'll do it. Give me a little time to get ready.
Take your time, beautiful. I'm here waiting for you. Can't wait to see you.
I took some pics. I'm really nervous about sending them though.
Don't be nervous, babe. I'm the only one who will see them. You can trust me. Please send them.
Okay, I'm sending them now. Please don't share them with anyone.
Wow, you look amazing! Thank you so much for trusting me. You're so beautiful.
Thank you. I'm glad you liked them. I feel a bit better now.
I more than liked them, I love them. You're the best. I miss you so much.
I miss you too. Maybe we can meet up soon?
That would be amazing. Let's plan something special just for us.
Sounds good. I'll think about it and let you know.
Perfect. Can't wait to see you in person. Love you lots.
Love you too. Talk to you later.
